meanings.definition: A person who expects or anticipates something.
meanings.sent1: The expectants eagerly awaited the arrival of their new baby.
meanings.sent2: The expectants in the audience were excited for the surprise announcement.
meanings.sent3: The expectants at the party were thrilled to see the birthday cake.
meanings.sent4: The expectants in the race were determined to reach the finish line first.
meanings.sent5: The expectants in the theater held their breath as the curtain rose.

meanings.definition: A substance or material that is expected to produce a certain effect.
meanings.sent1: The expectants in the experiment were hopeful for a positive outcome.
meanings.sent2: The expectants in the recipe added the secret ingredient for flavor.
meanings.sent3: The expectants in the garden were surprised by the growth of the new plant.
meanings.sent4: The expectants in the lab mixed the chemicals carefully to avoid any accidents.
meanings.sent5: The expectants in the project eagerly anticipated the final results.
